DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess efficacy safety BoNT/A-DP treatment glabellar line comparison placebo , include efficacy repeat treatment long term safety .
DOC.brief_title: Botulinum Toxin Treatment Glabellar Lines : Efficacy Safety Study I
